entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Periods of rain over southern sections this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of wet flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of wet flurries this evening. 60 percent chance of wet flurries near Boston Bar overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
